abstract: The U.S. securities regulator has probed certain Citigroup debt funds to assess whether the bank made adequate disclosure to investors about the funds’ risk levels, The Wall Street Journal said, citing people familiar with the matter.
snippet: The U.S. securities regulator has probed certain Citigroup debt funds to assess whether the bank made adequate disclosure to investors about the funds’ risk levels, The Wall Street Journal said, citing people familiar with the matter.
lead_paragraph: The Securities and Exchange Commission has investigated certain Citigroup debt funds to assess whether the bank made adequate disclosure to investors about the funds’ risk levels, The Wall Street Journal said, citing people familiar with the matter.

headline.main: Citigroup Debt Funds Investigated by S.E.C., Report Says
